Articles.Content: On some of the contracts it will say take a kerbal on "sub-orbital" flight or and "escape trajectory". I am unsure as what is meant in game for these. I figured a sub orbital flight would be any flight under orbit but that doesn't seem to be the case. Anyone know for sure what needs to be done on those?

Suborbital is any flight that goes past the atmosphere, but never gets in a stable orbit. (e.g no periapsis above 70km or so) (an apoapsis of 71km or more should work)

Escape trajectory is when you escape Kerbin's SOI, so leaving Kerbin's influence.
